H0.text: Provides energy is the function of the nucleus in a cell.

H1.text: Provides nutrients is the function of the nucleus in a cell.

H2.text: The nucleus controls activity in a cell.

H3.text: Controls movement is the function of the nucleus in a cell.

A4.text: The main function of the cell nucleus is to control gene expression and mediate the replication of DNA during the cell cycle.

A5.text: The nucleus maintains the integrity of genes and controls the activities of the cell by regulating gene expression.
